5f38aa8e-5121-4a69-94a7-b0eae72987d7.description: A fully integrated ticketing system is the first step to building a great customer experience. It's a central hub for all your customer questions, requests, and concerns. Above all, it gives you a complete picture of each customer, so you can offer the right support.
5f38aa8e-5121-4a69-94a7-b0eae72987d7.name: Foundational Support

badge_template_activities.title: This 2h 45m learning path contains 3 courses, lessons, downloadable content and an assessment to help you learn foundational support. We recommend completing the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

Zendesk customer training days are live, interactive sessions with our expert trainers. In the Foundational Support Track, you'll solidify your knowledge of our core Support product. You'll understand how to manage your agents and end users by defining access, workflows, and organizations and configuring business rules settings.

ba3a5e5b-1e53-4d89-b108-e2b2759d24ed.description: Zendesk is built for agents first, which means that the Agent Workspace is made for them. After all, agents just want to deliver seamless support without switching between dashboards or have customers repeat information. With the right tools and data in place, agents can maintain relevant, personal conversations on any channel.
ba3a5e5b-1e53-4d89-b108-e2b2759d24ed.name: Omnichannel Agent

badge_template_activities.title: This 2 hr and 40 minute learning path includes mixed-media courses, lessons, downloadable content, and knowledge checks with a short final assessment to help you learn Zendesk Talk, Zendesk Support, and Zendesk Messaging as an agent. We recommend taking the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

ddefbb23-c3e9-4325-9854-1701302c95d3.description: Data can be intimidating—all those charts, numbers, and spreadsheets. With Zendesk, understanding your customer service data is simple. Our reporting and analytics software gives you instant access to customer insights that can make your business better—no statistics degree required.
ddefbb23-c3e9-4325-9854-1701302c95d3.name: Explore / analytics

badge_template_activities.title: This 2h learning path contains 2 courses, lessons, downloadable content, and an assessment to help you learn Zendesk's reporting & analytics solution. We recommend taking the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

1b5db301-decf-44db-9ac4-209726724676.description: A Zendesk Support Administrator possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to implement, configure, and manage an Enterprise account of Zendesk Support. They have hands-on experience completing day-to-day operational tasks needed to manage a Zendesk Enterprise instance.
1b5db301-decf-44db-9ac4-209726724676.name: Zendesk Support Administrator Expert I

badge_template_activities.title: 3-6 Months in product experience (Optional)
2h 45m (Optional) Foundational Support Learning Path comprised of 3 courses and a learning assessment
40m (Optional) Zendesk Support Administrator Expert Practice Test
8h (Optional) Support Administrator Expert Certification Prep & Practice Workshop

7e996c9c-9fd0-49c8-9378-44d1a8fa5bc6.description: Get ready to create, organize, and share knowledge base articles and content easily with customer support agents, select customers, or the public—and measure what performs best.
7e996c9c-9fd0-49c8-9378-44d1a8fa5bc6.name: Guide / self-service

badge_template_activities.title: This 2h 30m learning path contains 4 courses, lessons, downloadable content, and an assessment to help you deliver best in-class self-service and empower your agents with a knowledge base. We recommend taking the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

da6517b5-d5d7-4c18-9b9f-712bbc94008e.description: Even in the age of emails, texts, and DMs, sometimes talking to a real human solves the problem fastest. Our integrated voice solution syncs with all other channels, and lets agents see all customer information right away. Now that has a nice ring to it.
da6517b5-d5d7-4c18-9b9f-712bbc94008e.name: Talk / voice

badge_template_activities.title: This 1h 20m learning path contains 2 courses, lessons, downloadable content, and an assessment to learn Zendesk's voice solution. We recommend taking the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

2568dd9a-0308-4866-ba14-aef783d59fbf.description: Customers expect great service across all channels. Messaging makes it easy to stay in touch with personalized and engaging interactions. With Zendesk, get messaging right out of the box or fully customize it to meet your needs.
2568dd9a-0308-4866-ba14-aef783d59fbf.name: Messaging

badge_template_activities.title: This 1h learning path contains 2 courses, lessons, downloadable content, and an assessment to help you learn Zendesk's messaging solution. We recommend taking the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

cc8e41d1-b478-4d3a-bbe0-12c80afd4727.description: A Zendesk omnichannel agent possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to answer requests from customers by navigating between channels in the Agent Workspace. This agent needs to contextualize customer information, engage in ongoing conversations with the customer, update ticket comments and fields, and navigate workflows.
cc8e41d1-b478-4d3a-bbe0-12c80afd4727.name: Zendesk Omnichannel Agent I

badge_template_activities.title: 3h (Optional) OmnichannelAgent Learning Path

3a527c07-3c99-44fd-ab0d-9b32db0a50e5.description: Sunshine Conversations lets you unify messages from every channel into a single conversation, and build interactive messaging experiences anywhere.
3a527c07-3c99-44fd-ab0d-9b32db0a50e5.name: Sunshine Conversations for Developers

badge_template_activities.title: This 40m learning path contains 2 courses, lessons, downloadable content and an assessment to help you learn Sunshine Conversations. We recommend completing the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

1c3b44c7-5f51-48ec-af74-ad2eb87770db.description: Our modern sales CRM frees you to maximize productivity, maintain pipeline visibility, and grow revenue. With Zendesk Sell, build data-driven teams to unlock team productivity, keep up with customer expectations, and get full pipeline visibility. Our CRM for sales teams offers everything you need in one simple platform—including contact and deal management, activity tracking, and lead generation. Plus, you can set up triggers and automate tasks to keep reps on target.
1c3b44c7-5f51-48ec-af74-ad2eb87770db.name: Sell for Admins

badge_template_activities.title: This on-demand, self paced learning path contains 4 courses, lessons, downloadable content and an assessment to help you learn Zendesk Sell. We recommend completing the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

f17bbf9b-53ee-4f13-9ebd-5ea481d730c3.description: Our modern sales CRM frees you to maximize productivity, maintain pipeline visibility, and grow revenue. With Zendesk Sell, build data-driven teams to unlock team productivity, keep up with customer expectations, and get full pipeline visibility. Our CRM for sales teams offers everything you need in one simple platform—including contact and deal management, activity tracking, and lead generation.
f17bbf9b-53ee-4f13-9ebd-5ea481d730c3.name: Sell for Users

badge_template_activities.title: This on-demand, self paced learning path contains 4 courses with text lessons, demo videos, downloadable content and an assessment to help you learn Zendesk Sell. We recommend completing the courses in the path sequence to ensure a quality learning experience.

53866a78-aa0c-42c3-9a16-b95822adf51c.description: A Zendesk Explore CX Analyst possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to configure and manage reporting using Zendesk Explore. The candidate has hands-on experience building custom calculations, charts, and dashboards and knows the ins and outs of distributing reports and managing permissions.
53866a78-aa0c-42c3-9a16-b95822adf51c.name: Zendesk Explore CX Analyst Expert I

badge_template_activities.title: At least 3 months of consistent use as a Zendesk Support Administrator
2h (Optional) Explore/Analytics Learning Path comprised of 2 courses and a learning assessment
40m (Optional) Zendesk Explore CX Analyst Expert Certification Practice Test
8h (Optional) Explore CX Analyst Expert Certification Prep & Practice Workshop

b99dd0ca-6ed2-4c1f-a250-ea9893062e51.description: A Zendesk Guide Specialist possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to implement, configure, and manage Guide Enterprise for content creation and delivery throughout the content lifecycle.
b99dd0ca-6ed2-4c1f-a250-ea9893062e51.name: Zendesk Guide Specialist I

badge_template_activities.title: A Zendesk Guide Specialist possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to implement, configure, and manage Guide Enterprise for content creation and delivery throughout the content lifecycle.
2.5h (Optional) Guide / Self-service Learning Path comprised of 4 courses and a learning assessment
40m (Optional) Zendesk Guide Specialist Certification Practice Test

017aee23-deae-4048-b85f-d064cdc579be.description: Zendesk App Developer I candidates possess the knowledge and skills necessary to develop scalable Zendesk apps on the Zendesk platform and leverage the REST APIs to extend Zendesk using web programming skills. They follow security best practices, understand version control, can use ZAT competently and can create and deploy working server-side apps.
017aee23-deae-4048-b85f-d064cdc579be.name: Zendesk App Developer Expert I

badge_template_activities.title: 1 year experience doing web development professionally and knowledge of web development (HTML, CSS, Javascript, REST APIs)
12m (Optional) Zendesk Overview: The Zendesk Developer Platform
90m (Optional) Build an App and Start to Work with the Zendesk API
40m (Optional) Zendesk App Developer I Expert Practice Test

803c62c2-bbb8-46de-a54b-7b12ca343d4c.description: Zendesk Yellow Belt partners demonstrate their ability to demonstrate Zendesk solutions and their ability to raise awareness around these. This also earns the 'Qualified SC' status as part of the Zendesk Partner Program.
803c62c2-bbb8-46de-a54b-7b12ca343d4c.name: Zendesk Partners Yellow Belt Badge

badge_template_activities.title: Zendesk Partners are required to record and submit a 30-minute demonstration for an example Zendesk customer use case.

1ad4a82f-02e6-4a62-89c9-8342b0e56902.description: A Zendesk Chat Specialist possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to configure workflows, manage queue volume and serve chats effectively. The candidate has hands-on experience configuring chat settings, managing queues, analytics and agents — along with regularly serving chats in Chat Enterprise.
1ad4a82f-02e6-4a62-89c9-8342b0e56902.name: Zendesk Chat Specialist I

badge_template_activities.title: At least 4-6 months of hands-on, in-product experience as a Zendesk Chat Admin and at least 2-3 months experience with Zendesk Support
11m (Optional) Zendesk Overview: Chat
1H (Optional) Chat for Admins I
40m (Optional) Zendesk Chat Specialist Certification Practice Test

94521fb5-934d-4dec-8f76-e1f6ae341a08.description: A Zendesk Talk Specialist possesses the knowledge and skills necessary to configure workflows, manage queue volume and handle calls and texts effectively. The candidate has hands-on experience configuring Talk network requirements, settings, managing queues, analytics and agents — along with regularly handling calls and texts.
94521fb5-934d-4dec-8f76-e1f6ae341a08.name: Zendesk Talk Specialist I

badge_template_activities.title: At least 6 months in-product working as a Talk user and at least 2-3 months experience with Zendesk Support
2h 20m (Optional) Talk / Voice Learning Path comprised of 2 courses and a learning assessment
40m (Optional) Zendesk Talk Specialist Certification Practice Test

6c264f93-b75b-40d1-8c25-19d55fd4e481.description: These badges are awarded to the winners and finalists of the partner demo cup competition conducted by Zendesk for its GTM partners. This recognition highlights the partners’ ability to Go to market with zendesk solutions in pre-sales capacity.
6c264f93-b75b-40d1-8c25-19d55fd4e481.name: Demo Cup Finalist

badge_template_activities.title: The participants created a recorded demonstration of a domain specific use case & solution that they specialize in. In doing so they utilized the Zendesk platform to its full potential and applied domain knowledge and creativity to customize this solution. They also applied pre-sales skills that they have learnt over their career and as part of Zendesk Partner pre-sales enablement initiatives.

skills.name: Ability to create unique use cases and solutions using Zendesk applications and platform
Ability to tell a story and highlight these solutions as part of a recorded demonstration

287b1f2e-8da6-4d0a-a60d-53ba3ece14c1.description: These badges are awarded to the winners and finalists of the partner demo cup competition conducted by Zendesk for its GTM partners. This recognition highlights the partners’ ability to Go to market with zendesk solutions in pre-sales capacity.
287b1f2e-8da6-4d0a-a60d-53ba3ece14c1.name: Demo Cup Winner
